在Ubuntu下更改MYSQL的字符集

28 November 2014

修改/etc/mysql/my.cnf：

[client]
default-character-set=utf8

[mysqld]
character_set_server=utf8

[mysql]
default-character-set=utf8

然后：sudo service mysql restart
